data.name: Venge
data.detailed_description:
In an effort to win some money, you decide to explore a once magnificent movie studio that vanished into thin air a few years back. After a terrible fall, you find yourself trapped in the haunted, abandoned world of Rotnic Entertainment. After stumbling around, you suddenly wake the spirits and get transported to THEIR world. Their world is different than our own... very different...
This game contains a variety of gameplay styles, art styles, and bosses. From exploring an abandoned building haunted by stalking ghosts to parkouring through a foggy cave, the main game is split into different lands, each with its own bosses and mechanics. Your choices matter in this world, the world watches you and learns from you, doing its best to give you the spookiest and most fun experience.

Only 2/6 acts have been released. More on the way!

About Each Act:

Act 0 is an introduction to the game, you learn the backstory to Act 1. You'll learn who you play as and why you should go. It is a shorter act, but important nonetheless. Act 0 takes about 10-30 minutes to play.

Act 1 starts off slowly. You can explore by your own free will, take your time, explore around. As you explore, you'll be haunted by the horrors of the remains of Rotnic Entertainment. The game will then quickly pick up the pace and you will start to learn the crazy world of Venge. You'll solve some simple puzzles as you are introduced to 5 unique bosses. Each boss has its own unique art style and mechanics. Act 1 takes about 1-3 hours to play.

Act 0 - Free (Demo)
Act 1 - $1.99
Act 2 - In Development
Act 3 - Not Released
Act 4 - Not Released
Act X - Not Released

Gameplay

Venge is an indie game created by Ekrcoaster, this game contains 6 Acts (2 released currently) and plenty of unique minigames that build off of the main game. The game is replayable with multiple endings and sequences of events. The game starts slow but steady, as the game goes on, it builds in intensity as you discover more and more. Explore and battle creatures unlike you've ever seen. Each one different and each one challenging. This game learns as you play and adjusts itself accordingly to give you the best experience. Each new act will come with new adventures and so much more.

data.short_description: In an effort to win some money, you decide to explore a once magnificent movie studio that vanished into thin air a few years back. After a terrible fall, you find yourself trapped in the abandoned world of Rotnic Entertainment. Suddenly, you wake the spirits and get transported to THEIR world...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8750H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Catalina
  • Storage: 64 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Catalina
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
